knimeNode.name: Row To Variable Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: Iterates over an input data table, whereby each row defines on iteration with variable settings taken from the values in that row

fullDescription.intro: This node uses each row of a data table to define new variable values for each loop iteration. The names of the variables are defined by the column names.

ports.dataIn: The table whose rows will constitute variables' values for each iteration.
ports.dataOut: The connection passing on the variable values to the next nodes.
